Elder Ragnir:
Although Kamaels were the Giants' creations, we didn't want to live under the domination of our creators, and therefore had to flee.
For the long time we have been living in seclusion, apart from the common world. So long, that the world itself has changed. And finally our people can live freely.
We have awakened from the long sleep having lost most of our painful memories of the past. We are entering the new life leaving those memories behind.
